    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2358</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radiaoctive determination of metabolic activity of bacteria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radiaoctive Ermittlung der metabolischen 
Aktivität des Bakteriums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination de Radiaoctive de l'activité 
métabolique des bactéries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinação de Radiaoctive da atividade 
metabolic das bactérias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione di Radiaoctive di attività 
metabolica dei batteri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορισμός Radiaoctive της μεταβολικής 
δραστηριότητας των βακτηριδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación de Radiaoctive de la actividad 
metabólica de bacterias</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animated demonstration of the preparation of a microautoradiogram for the identification of metabolically active bacteria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microautoradiogram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metabilsm</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine lebhafte Demonstration der Vorbereitung eines
microautoradiogram für das Kennzeichen des metabolisch aktiven 
Bakteriums.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une démonstration animée de la préparation d'un
microautoradiogram pour l'identification des bactéries 
métaboliquement actives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma demonstração animated da preparação de um 
microautoradiogram para a identificação das bactérias metabolically
ativas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una dimostrazione animata della preparazione di un
microautoradiogram per l'identificazione dei batteri metabolicamente 
attivi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωντανεψοντη επίδειξη της προετοιμασίας ενός 
microautoradiogram για τον προσδιορισμό των metabolically 
ενεργών βακτηριδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una demostración animada de la preparación de un
microautoradiogram para la identificación de bacterias metabólico 
activas.</string>
          </description>
